name: type_pattern
objective: Entering a search pattern in search fields triggers a search and displays results
description: When typing characters into the search filter input field, each added character must trigger a search and must lead to displayed results in the right area.
pre_condition: switch to application mode (click on "Applications" in the top bar)

steps.description: type a pattern in the search filter input field (ex: 'term')
steps.expected: the matching applications (name matches) must be displayed in the result area (ex: 'Terminal' and 'XTerm')

steps.description: type another pattern which is not linked to app name (ex: 'cam')
steps.expected: the matching applications (description matches) must be displayed (ex: 'Shotweel' and 'Cheese')

author: sdx

name: result_type
objective: Only applications must be displayed in the results
description:
On the contrary of the default Gnome behaviour, only applications must be displayed in the result area: contacts, documents etc shouldn't appear.

TODO: to be confirmed
pre_condition:
- switch to application mode (click on "Applications" in the top bar)
- create a contact using contact application (ex: contact is named 'kooltux')

steps.expected: only applications must be listed in the result area (ex: only 'Shotwell','Bluetooth' and 'Power', not the contact 'kooltux')

author: sdx
